Assistant: The goals of the organization are to improve the conditions of the Muslim population in Afghanistan, end what it sees as the repressive and colonizing policies of the US, and implement a Muslim state run on fundamentalist Islamic values. It has a presence in many countries throughout the world, and is considered to be a terrorist organization by the US, as well as by several other governments.  The organization’s name comes from a database and translation bureau Al Qaeda previously maintained, which translates propaganda materials into English.  The word Qaeda is Arabic for base.
